voice.name: en-GB-LibbyNeural
voice.prosody: The following quotes are from act 2, scene 7, of William Shakespeare's play "As You Like It."

voice.name: en-GB-RyanNeural
voice.prosody:
All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players:
They have their exits and their entrances; And one man in his time plays many parts, His acts being seven ages.

voice.name: en-IE-ConnorNeural
voice.prosody:
Thou seest we are not all alone unhappy:
This wide and universal theatre Presents more woeful pageants than the scene Wherein we play in.
